com.communote.common.menu

Interface MenuItem<T extends MenuEntry>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the sub-items
    All Superinterfaces:
    MenuEntry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryEntry

    public interface MenuItem<T extends MenuEntry>
extends MenuEntry
    An item of a menu which can have sub-items.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<T> getChildren() 
      boolean hasChildren() 
      void setChildren(List<T> children)
      set the children of this menu item

      • Methods inherited from interface com.communote.common.menu.MenuEntry

        getId, getLabel, getLocalizedLabel

    • Method Detail

      • getChildren

        List<T> getChildren()
        Returns:
        the sub-items of the menu item or null if hasChildren() returns false

      • hasChildren

        boolean hasChildren()
        Returns:
        whether the menu item contains other (sub-) menu items

      • setChildren

        void setChildren(List<T> children)
        set the children of this menu item
        Parameters:
        children - the sub-items to set
